channel.title: attack.initial_access on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.initial_access on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Suspicious MSExchangeMailboxReplication ASPX Write
item.description: Detects suspicious activity in which the MSExchangeMailboxReplication process writes .asp and .apsx files to disk, which could be a sign of ProxyShell exploitation

item.title: Suspicious Computer Machine Password by PowerShell
item.description: The Reset-ComputerMachinePassword cmdlet changes the computer account password that the computers use to authenticate to the domain controllers in the domain. You can use it to reset the password of the local computer.

item.title: Java Class Proxy Download
item.description: Detects Java class download in proxy logs, e.g. used in Log4shell exploitation attacks against Log4j.

item.title: Shells Spawn by Java
item.description: Detects shell spawn from Java host process, which could a maintenance task or some kind of exploitation (e.g. log4j exploitation)

item.title: Suspicious Shells Spawn by Java
item.description: Detects suspicious shell spawn from Java host process (e.g. log4j exploitation)

item.title: Suspicious Shells Spawn by Java Utility Keytool
item.description: Detects suspicious shell spawn from Java utility keytool process (e.g. adselfservice plus exploitation)

item.title: Log4j RCE CVE-2021-44228 in Fields
item.description: Detects exploitation attempt against log4j RCE vulnerability reported as CVE-2021-44228 in different header fields found in web server logs (Log4Shell)

item.title: Log4j RCE CVE-2021-44228 Generic
item.description: Detects exploitation attempt against log4j RCE vulnerability reported as CVE-2021-44228 (Log4Shell)

item.title: Azure Subscription Permission Elevation Via ActivityLogs
item.description: Detects when a user has been elevated to manage all Azure Subscriptions. This change should be investigated immediately if it isn’t planned. This setting could allow an attacker access to Azure subscriptions in your environment.

item.title: Azure Subscription Permission Elevation Via AuditLogs
item.description: Detects when a user has been elevated to manage all Azure Subscriptions. This change should be investigated immediately if it isn’t planned. This setting could allow an attacker access to Azure subscriptions in your environment.

item.title: Azure Unusual Authentication Interruption
item.description: Detects when there is a interruption in the authentication process.

item.title: LPE InstallerFileTakeOver PoC CVE-2021-41379
item.description: Detects PoC tool used to exploit LPE vulnerability CVE-2021-41379

item.title: Sitecore Pre-Auth RCE CVE-2021-42237
item.description: Detects exploitation attempts of Sitecore Experience Platform Pre-Auth RCE CVE-2021-42237 found in Report.ashx

item.title: Login to Disabled Account
item.description: Detect failed attempts to sign in to disabled accounts.

item.title: Multifactor Authentication Interupted
item.description: Identifies user login with multifactor authentication failures, which might be an indication an attacker has the password for the account but can’t pass the MFA challenge.

item.title: Path Traversal Exploitation Attempts
item.description: Detects path traversal exploitation attempts

item.title: VMware vCenter Server File Upload CVE-2021-22005
item.description: Detects exploitation attempts using file upload vulnerability CVE-2021-22005 in the VMWare vCenter Server.

item.title: AWS Suspicious SAML Activity
item.description: Identifies when suspicious SAML activity has occurred in AWS. An adversary could gain backdoor access via SAML.

item.title: OMIGOD HTTP No Authentication RCE
item.description: Detects the exploitation of OMIGOD (CVE-2021-38647) which allows remote execute (RCE) commands as root with just a single unauthenticated HTTP request. Verify, successful, exploitation by viewing the HTTP client (request) body to see what was passed to the server (using PCAP). Within the client body is where the code execution would occur. Additionally, check the endpoint logs to see if suspicious commands or activity occurred within the timeframe of this HTTP request.

item.title: OMIGOD SCX RunAsProvider ExecuteScript
item.description: Rule to detect the use of the SCX RunAsProvider ExecuteScript to execute any UNIX/Linux script using the /bin/sh shell. Script being executed gets created as a temp file in /tmp folder with a scx* prefix. Then it is invoked from the following directory /etc/opt/microsoft/scx/conf/tmpdir/. The file in that directory has the same prefix scx*. SCXcore, started as the Microsoft Operations Manager UNIX/Linux Agent, is now used in a host of products including Microsoft Operations Manager. Microsoft Azure, and Microsoft Operations Management Suite.

item.title: OMIGOD SCX RunAsProvider ExecuteShellCommand
item.description: Rule to detect the use of the SCX RunAsProvider Invoke_ExecuteShellCommand to execute any UNIX/Linux command using the /bin/sh shell. SCXcore, started as the Microsoft Operations Manager UNIX/Linux Agent, is now used in a host of products including Microsoft Operations Manager. Microsoft Azure, and Microsoft Operations Management Suite.

item.title: OMIGOD SCX RunAsProvider ExecuteShellCommand
item.description: Rule to detect the use of the SCX RunAsProvider Invoke_ExecuteShellCommand to execute any UNIX/Linux command using the /bin/sh shell. SCXcore, started as the Microsoft Operations Manager UNIX/Linux Agent, is now used in a host of products including Microsoft Operations Manager. Microsoft Azure, and Microsoft Operations Management Suite.

item.title: CVE-2010-5278 Exploitation Attempt
item.description: MODx manager - Local File Inclusion:Directory traversal vulnerability in manager/controllers/default/resource/tvs.php in MODx Revolution 2.0.2-pl, and possibly earlier, when magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the class_key parameter.

item.title: Atlassian Confluence CVE-2021-26084
item.description: Detects spawning of suspicious child processes by Atlassian Confluence server which may indicate successful exploitation of CVE-2021-26084

item.title: CVE-2021-40539 Zoho ManageEngine ADSelfService Plus Exploit
item.description: Detects an authentication bypass vulnerability affecting the REST API URLs in ADSelfService Plus (CVE-2021-40539).

item.title: CVE-2021-33766 Exchange ProxyToken Exploitation
item.description: Detects the exploitation of Microsoft Exchange ProxyToken vulnerability as described in CVE-2021-33766

item.title: Arcadyan Router Exploitations
item.description: Detects exploitation of vulnerabilities in Arcadyan routers as reported in CVE-2021-20090 and CVE-2021-20091.

item.title: Fortinet CVE-2021-22123 Exploitation
item.description: Detects CVE-2021-22123 exploitation attempt against Fortinet WAFs

item.title: Pulse Connect Secure RCE Attack CVE-2021-22893
item.description: This rule detects exploitation attempts using Pulse Connect Secure(PCS) vulnerability (CVE-2021-22893)

item.title: CVE-2021-21978 Exploitation Attempt
item.description: Detects the exploitation of the VMware View Planner vulnerability described in CVE-2021-21978

item.title: CVE-2021-21972 VSphere Exploitation
item.description: Detects the exploitation of VSphere Remote Code Execution vulnerability as described in CVE-2021-21972

item.title: TerraMaster TOS CVE-2020-28188
item.description: Detects the exploitation of the TerraMaster TOS vulnerability described in CVE-2020-28188

item.title: Oracle WebLogic Exploit CVE-2021-2109
item.description: Detects the exploitation of the WebLogic server vulnerability described in CVE-2021-2109

item.title: CVE-2020-10148 SolarWinds Orion API Auth Bypass
item.description: Detects CVE-2020-10148 SolarWinds Orion API authentication bypass attempts

item.title: Suspicious Shells Spawn by SQL Server
item.description: Detects suspicious shell spawn from MSSQL process, this might be sight of RCE or SQL Injection

item.title: DNS RCE CVE-2020-1350
item.description: Detects exploitation of DNS RCE bug reported in CVE-2020-1350 by the detection of suspicious sub process

item.title: Citrix ADS Exploitation CVE-2020-8193 CVE-2020-8195
item.description: Detects exploitation attempt against Citrix Netscaler, Application Delivery Controller (ADS) and Citrix Gateway exploiting vulnerabilities reported as CVE-2020-8193 and CVE-2020-8195

item.title: Exploited CVE-2020-10189 Zoho ManageEngine
item.description: Detects the exploitation of Zoho ManageEngine Desktop Central Java Deserialization vulnerability reported as CVE-2020-10189

item.title: CVE-2020-0688 Exchange Exploitation via Web Log
item.description: Detects the exploitation of Microsoft Exchange vulnerability as described in CVE-2020-0688

item.title: CVE-2020-0688 Exploitation via Eventlog
item.description: Detects the exploitation of Microsoft Exchange vulnerability as described in CVE-2020-0688

item.title: CVE-2020-0688 Exploitation Attempt
item.description: Detects CVE-2020-0688 Exploitation attempts

item.title: Windows Registry Trust Record Modification
item.description: Alerts on trust record modification within the registry, indicating usage of macros

item.title: External Disk Drive Or USB Storage Device
item.description: Detects external diskdrives or plugged in USB devices , EventID 6416 on windows 10 or later

item.title: Pulse Secure Attack CVE-2019-11510
item.description: Detects CVE-2019-11510 exploitation attempt - URI contains Guacamole

item.title: Possible DNS Rebinding
item.description: Detects several different DNS-answers by one domain with IPs from internal and external networks. Normally, DNS-answer contain TTL >100. (DNS-record will saved in host cache for a while TTL).

item.title: Suspicious HWP Sub Processes
item.description: Detects suspicious Hangul Word Processor (Hanword) sub processes that could indicate an exploitation

item.title: Suspicious Double Extension
item.description: Detects suspicious use of an .exe extension after a non-executable file extension like .pdf.exe, a set of spaces or underlines to cloak the executable file in spear phishing campaigns

item.title: Terminal Service Process Spawn
item.description: Detects a process spawned by the terminal service server process (this could be an indicator for an exploitation of CVE-2019-0708)

item.title: Droppers Exploiting CVE-2017-11882
item.description: Detects exploits that use CVE-2017-11882 to start EQNEDT32.EXE and other sub processes like mshta.exe

item.title: Exploit for CVE-2017-0261
item.description: Detects Winword starting uncommon sub process FLTLDR.exe as used in exploits for CVE-2017-0261 and CVE-2017-0262

item.title: Oracle WebLogic Exploit
item.description: Detects access to a webshell dropped into a keystore folder on the WebLogic server

item.title: Suspicious Named Error
item.description: Detects suspicious DNS error messages that indicate a fatal or suspicious error that could be caused by exploiting attempts

item.title: Suspicious SQL Error Messages
item.description: Detects SQL error messages that indicate probing for an injection attack

item.title: Exploit for CVE-2017-8759
item.description: Detects Winword starting uncommon sub process csc.exe as used in exploits for CVE-2017-8759

item.title: Python SQL Exceptions
item.description: Generic rule for SQL exceptions in Python according to PEP 249

item.title: Suspicious OpenSSH Daemon Error
item.description: Detects suspicious SSH / SSHD error messages that indicate a fatal or suspicious error that could be caused by exploiting attempts

item.title: Download EXE from Suspicious TLD
item.description: Detects executable downloads from suspicious remote systems

item.title: Multiple Suspicious Resp Codes Caused by Single Client
item.description: Detects possible exploitation activity or bugs in a web application

item.title: Account Tampering - Suspicious Failed Logon Reasons
item.description: This method uses uncommon error codes on failed logons to determine suspicious activity and tampering with accounts that have been disabled or somehow restricted.

item.title: Arbitrary Shell Command Execution Via Settingcontent-Ms
item.description: The .SettingContent-ms file type was introduced in Windows 10 and allows a user to create “shortcuts” to various Windows 10 setting pages. These files are simply XML and contain paths to various Windows 10 settings binaries.

item.title: Azure Domain Federation Settings Modified
item.description: Identifies when an user or application modified the federation settings on the domain.

item.title: Cisco ASA FTD Exploit CVE-2020-3452
item.description: Detects exploitation attempts on Cisco ASA FTD systems exploiting CVE-2020-3452 with a status code of 200 (sccessful exploitation)

item.title: Citrix Netscaler Attack CVE-2019-19781
item.description: Detects CVE-2019-19781 exploitation attempt against Citrix Netscaler, Application Delivery Controller and Citrix Gateway Attack

item.title: Confluence Exploitation CVE-2019-3398
item.description: Detects the exploitation of the Confluence vulnerability described in CVE-2019-3398

item.title: CVE-2020-5902 F5 BIG-IP Exploitation Attempt
item.description: Detects the exploitation attempt of the vulnerability found in F5 BIG-IP and described in CVE-2020-5902

item.title: CVE-2021-41773 Exploitation Attempt
item.description: Detects exploitation of flaw in path normalization in Apache HTTP server 2.4.49. An attacker could use a path traversal attack to map URLs to files outside the expected document root. If files outside of the document root are not protected by “require all denied” these requests can succeed. Additionally this flaw could leak the source of interpreted files like CGI scripts. This issue is known to be exploited in the wild. This issue only affects Apache 2.4.49 and not earlier versions.

item.title: Disabled Users Failing To Authenticate From Source Using Kerberos
item.description: Detects failed logins with multiple disabled domain accounts from a single source system using the Kerberos protocol.

item.title: Django Framework Exceptions
item.description: Detects suspicious Django web application framework exceptions that could indicate exploitation attempts

item.title: Download from Suspicious TLD
item.description: Detects download of certain file types from hosts in suspicious TLDs

item.title: Exchange Exploitation CVE-2021-28480
item.description: Detects successful exploitation of Exchange vulnerability as reported in CVE-2021-28480

item.title: Exchange Exploitation Used by HAFNIUM
item.description: Detects exploitation attempts in Exchange server logs as described in blog posts reporting on HAFNIUM group activity

item.title: Exchange ProxyShell Pattern
item.description: Detects URL patterns that could be found in ProxyShell exploitation attempts against Exchange servers (failed and successful)

item.title: Execution in Outlook Temp Folder
item.description: Detects a suspicious program execution in Outlook temp folder

item.title: Exploitation of CVE-2021-26814 in Wazuh
item.description: Detects the exploitation of the Wazuh RCE vulnerability described in CVE-2021-26814

item.description: Detects CVE-2018-13379 exploitation attempt against Fortinet SSL VPNs

item.description: Detects a successful Grafana path traversal exploitation

item.description: Detects suspicious user agent strings user by hack tools in proxy logs

item.description: Detects failed logins with multiple invalid domain accounts from a single source system using the NTLM protocol.

item.title: Invalid Users Failing To Authenticate From Source Using Kerberos
item.description: Detects failed logins with multiple invalid domain accounts from a single source system using the Kerberos protocol.

item.title: ISO Image Mount
item.description: Detects the mount of ISO images on an endpoint

item.title: Logon from a Risky IP Address
item.description: Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported when a user signs into your sanctioned apps from a risky IP address.

item.title: Microsoft 365 - Impossible Travel Activity
item.description: Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported a risky sign-in attempt due to a login associated with an impossible travel.

item.title: Microsoft 365 - User Restricted from Sending Email
item.description: Detects when a Security Compliance Center reported a user who exceeded sending limits of the service policies and because of this has been restricted from sending email.

item.title: Multiple Users Attempting To Authenticate Using Explicit Credentials
item.description: Detects a source user failing to authenticate with multiple users using explicit credentials on a host.

item.description: Detects failed logins with multiple accounts from a single process on the system.

item.title: Multiple Users Remotely Failing To Authenticate From Single Source
item.description: Detects a source system failing to authenticate against a remote host with multiple users.

item.title: Oracle WebLogic Exploit CVE-2020-14882
item.description: Detects exploitation attempts on WebLogic servers

item.title: Ruby on Rails Framework Exceptions
item.description: Detects suspicious Ruby on Rails exceptions that could indicate exploitation attempts

item.title: ScreenConnect Remote Access
item.description: Detects ScreenConnect program starts that establish a remote access to that system (not meeting, not remote support)

item.description: Detects exploitation attempts of the SonicWall Jarrewrite Exploit

item.title: Spring Framework Exceptions
item.description: Detects suspicious Spring framework exceptions that could indicate exploitation attempts

item.description: Detects URP patterns and status codes that indicate a successful ProxyShell exploitation attack against Exchange servers

item.title: Successful IIS Shortname Fuzzing Scan
item.description: When IIS uses an old .Net Framework it’s possible to enumeration folder with the symbol ~.

item.description: Detects suspicious shell spawn from WinRM host process

item.description: Detects suspicious VSFTPD error messages that indicate a fatal or suspicious error that could be caused by exploiting attempts

item.description: Detects Ursnif C2 traffic.

item.description: Detects plugged USB devices
